mapper.insert:
delete from admin_stock_in; insert into admin_stock_in (shop_code, goods_code, goods_number, goods_name, purchase_type, purchase_total, purchase_money, purchase_price, purchase_batch, supplier_name, brand_name, product_place, purchase_date, purchase_status) VALUES
(#{item.shopCode}, #{item.goodsCode}, #{item.goodsNumber}, #{item.goodsName}, #{item.purchaseType},#{item.purchaseTotal}, #{item.purchaseTotal}, #{item.purchasePrice}, #{item.purchaseBatch}, #{item.supplierName}, #{item.brandName}, #{item.productPlace}, #{item.purchaseDate}, #{item.purchaseStatus}) ;
